[[arg1 // 10]] + [[arg2 // 10]] = [[arg1 // 10 + arg2 // 10]]. [[get_tens_statement(arg1 // 10 + arg2 // 10)]] $$ \begin{array}{l r} &{\color{Salmon} [[arg1 // 10]]} [[arg1 % 10]]\\ +&{\color{Salmon}[[arg2 // 10]]}[[arg2 % 10]]\\ \hline & {\color{Salmon}[[check_zero_at_tens(arg1 // 10 + arg2 // 10)]]}[[arg1 % 10 + arg2 % 10]]\\ \end{array} $$ So the answer is [[arg1 + arg2]].

So the sum of this column will be $[[arg1//10 + arg2//10 + 1]]$.
